entities.name: harry
entities.description: The main character of the story, referred to as 'he' and 'Harry'. He is trying to follow James in a different direction.

entities.name: james
entities.description: One of Harry's friends, who has a Golden Snitch. He is mentioned as having excellent reflexes.

entities.name: sirius
entities.description: Another one of Harry's friends, who thinks he will get an Outstanding grade on the paper.

entities.name: snape
entities.description: A teacher who is following James and his friends. He seems to be unaware of where he is going.

entities.name: golden snitch
entities.description: An object that James has in his pocket and is playing with.

entities.name: paper
entities.description: A piece of paper that Sirius thinks was easy to complete. He believes he will get an Outstanding grade on it.

entities.name: lake
entities.description: A location where James and his friends are heading towards.

entities.name: lawn
entities.description: An area of grass where James and his friends are walking.

relationships.description: Harry is trying to follow James in a different direction.
Snape is following James and his friends.
James has a Golden Snitch in his pocket.
Sirius is related to the paper, as he thinks it was easy to complete and believes he will get an Outstanding grade on it.
